product_highlights: SymProBiome™ Platform - Comprehensive microbiome research platform for skin, scalp, oral, and gut health
SymReboot® L19 - Microbiome-balancing active for skin health

notes: Leading cosmetic ingredient supplier with comprehensive SymProBiome™ platform covering skin microbiome (dry skin, sweat/moist skin, scalp), product protection with microbiome-friendly preservatives, sun protection with microbiome-safe UV filters, oral cavity microbiome, and gut health prebiotics and probiotics. Revolutionary approach to microbiome science with extensive research backing and clinical validation.
